Real estate subject to sale. All real estate on which the taxes shall not have been paid as provided by law on or before May 10 in each year, commencing with the year 1941, shall be subject to sale as hereinafter provided. History: L. 1876, ch. 34, § 105; R.S. 1923, 79-2301; L. 1941, ch. 375, § 1; L. 2010, ch. 26, § 3; July 1. Prev Article 23. - SALE OF REAL ESTATE FOR TAXES Next 2025. Powered by KLISS.
